lead_paragraph: The S.E.C. said it declined to pursue a fraud enforcement action in the case because of jurisdictional issues.
snippet: The S.E.C. said it declined to pursue a fraud enforcement action in the case because of jurisdictional issues.

headline.main: No Charges for Moody’s in Ratings Violation
headline.seo: S.E.C. Won’t Charge Moody’s With Ratings Violation
headline.print_headline: No Charges For Moody’s In Ratings Violation
